name: Ambulance Emergency Rescue Sim
description:
Drive your ambulance car around the city to do a rescue service and transfer injured people into hospital. Reached the current location and gave first aid to serious patients. As an ambulance driver, perform multiple rescue missions in the big city. Firstly, you will receive an emergency call from your department that some workers are injured at the working site. Now you will drive and reach your current location and rescue them in a nearby hospital. You will drive very carefully on the busy road of the big city and quickly reach incident areas in limited time duration. Suddenly, a bomb blast occurs in the shopping mall now you will reach your destination. Give them first aid and rescue all injured patients to the hospital. To do rescue, save the lives of serious people. The graphics and animation of this ambulance game are very attractive and will surely amaze you. So turn on the ambulance siren and pass through the heavy traffic. Take the patients to the nearby hospital as soon as possible in this emergency game.

** Key Features **
• Rescue injured people at nearby town hospital
• Perform multiple rescue missions to try to accomplish them
• Realistic gameplay with amazing sound
• High quality graphics with 3d city environment
